metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for developing with Rimitive - composable reactive modules

plugins.name: rimitive-compose
plugins.description: Help composing Rimitive services with the right modules and imports

plugins.name: rimitive-behavior
plugins.description: Create headless behaviors - portable reactive logic without UI

plugins.name: rimitive-view
plugins.description: Build views with el, map, match, and other view modules

plugins.name: rimitive-module
plugins.description: Create custom modules with defineModule for extending Rimitive
